posts.post_content:
I think the scans should be nice and close up but see below for additional details on condition.  None have paper loss.Priced so they can move into a new collection.  Please Pm.  thanks  -peter

Barry - Phil - Polar Bear - no creases.  (tough card to find.  for me?) vg.  $40ppd

Brain - Buffalo - SCap - light creasing, not easily seen.   $15ppd

Devore - Sovereign 460 - one crease - across Josh's face.  tiny tear  $20ppd 

Livingstone - Phil - smooth card, no creases.  small mark on back.   $16ppd

Murphy w/ bat - crease through top to bottom.   $10ppd

Miller - (SOUTHERN LEAGUER) Old Mill.  - Molly has a crease at the top.  otherwise strong card.    $60ppd
Ill take Murphy. Just send me paypal address. Thanks
Although Murphy, Brain and Devore have been sold.   thank you...peter
Did you sell Murphy to me? If so can you send me your paypal info.
Email sent on Livingston. Spent the evening getting my T206s in order...thought I had him...but didn't.
